title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.60 - Soil erosion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.60 - Soil erosion

State Regulations

Any project within the jurisdiction of the commission
which involves a significant disturbance of ground cover shall include sound
practices of excavation, sediment retention, backfill, and reseeding to
minimize soil erosion and deposition of sediment in streams. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
